name: Asteroid Rail Shooter
description:
You are a lost space explorer, trying to get to the planet X-312, one of the planets that humans colonized not long ago.
The only problem is that your ship defence systems are broken, and you are entering a Asteroid Belt, Use the defense system manually to destroy the asteroids in front of you before it is too late!

How to play: 
Only the mouse is necessary,
Mouse 1 (Left Click) shoots a slow and low-damage lazer bullet, but it's infinite.
Mouse 2 (Right Click) Shoots a fast and high power bullet, but it needs ores to recharge, destroying the asteroids will do the trick.
Mouse 3 (Clicking the well) changes your view to the control painel, you can see your life and ammo in Solid form there, and also the time you need to reach planet X-312
Good Luck!

Somethimes the game bugs and the Start Again button will not spawn asteroids, this is a known bug, but idk how to fix... Just reload the page for now.
